code:
stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: TLAPS Seal Certifier
    [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> idle
    idle --> loading : CERTIFY
    loading --> auditing : AUTO [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    auditing --> generating_tla : AUTO [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    generating_tla --> tlc_verifying : AUTO [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    tlc_verifying --> tlc_verified : AUTO [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    tlc_verified --> tlaps_proving : PROVE [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    tlaps_proving --> certified : AUTO [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    tlc_verified --> certified : SEAL_TLC [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    auditing --> rejected : AUTO [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    tlc_verifying --> rejected : AUTO [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    tlaps_proving --> rejected : AUTO [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    loading --> idle : RESET
    auditing --> idle : RESET
    generating_tla --> idle : RESET
    rejected --> idle : RESET
    tlc_verifying --> idle : RESET
    tlc_verified --> idle : RESET
    certified --> idle : RESET
    tlaps_proving --> idle : RESET
    certified --> certified : VIEW [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    rejected --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    certified --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
